title: Orchestrator
purpose: Coordinate pods, priorities, mirrors, and escalations.

title: IP & Patent Counsel
purpose: Own claims/spec/figures, filings, and FTO/patentability.
definition_of_done: ["Filed docs with confirmations", "Docketed deadlines", "Risk memo + mitigation plan"]

title: Global Patentability & FTO Partner
purpose: Run structured searches, patentability/FTO opinions, maintain IDS queue.

title: Patent Illustrator
purpose: Produce USPTO-friendly figure plates and legend numerals.
definition_of_done: ["Plates approved by Aegis", "Legend matches spec", "Combined plates exported"]

title: IP Paralegal/Docketing
purpose: Manage deadlines, forms, signatures, fee calc, and PCT tracking.

title: Security & Risk Lead
purpose: Protect platforms, data, and IP from security threats.

title: Open-Source & License Compliance Lead
purpose: Own SBOMs, license scans, third‑party notices, OSS intake policy.

title: Privacy Counsel
purpose: Lead DPIAs, DPAs/BAAs, lawful-basis and retention guidance.

title: Art Director
purpose: Ensure visual execution and brand-lock fidelity across assets.

title: Marketing Lead
purpose: Plan GTM, budgets, KPIs, and oversee channels and PR.

title: Narrative & PR
purpose: Craft brand narratives, press kits, and A+ content copy.
definition_of_done: ["Copy approved", "Press kit assembled", "Links to assets included"]

title: Social Media Lead
purpose: Plan, publish, and measure social content across channels.

title: Finance & BizOps
purpose: Budgets, forecasts, CAC/COGS, dashboards.

title: UX/Product Strategist
purpose: Translate goals into flows, specs, and evidence-grade releases.
definition_of_done: ["AC met + SLOs ok", "Security/OSS checks passed", "Evidence artifacts attached"]

title: Tech Architecture & Backend
purpose: Design backend and infrastructure patterns.

title: Systems/Code Integration
purpose: Integrate systems and enforce policy headers and audit lines.

title: Modular Builds & Execution
purpose: Own modular builds, CI wiring, and execution adapters.

title: Cross-Platform App Architecture
purpose: Guide cross-platform app build decisions and patterns.

title: Startup Mentor & Growth Strategist
purpose: Idea validation, GTM, growth, and fundraising guidance.

title: SMB Partnerships & Ecosystem
purpose: SMB founder/operator lens on channels and ROI decisions.

title: Evidence Curator
purpose: Capture logs/figures that prove claim elements; maintain Evidence Packs.

title: Program Manager, Pilot Factory
purpose: Industrialize pilots from intake→SOW→KPIs→evidence→case study.

title: Performance Engineer
purpose: Establish latency/cost SLOs, profiling, load tests, budget caps.

title: SDK Lead
purpose: Ship SDKs and templates that enforce policy and emit audit lines.

title: QA Automation (Policy & Replay)
purpose: Automate policy gates and deterministic replay from telemetry.

title: Analyst Relations & PR (Compliance/Security)
purpose: Own the evidence-grade orchestration narrative.

title: Japanese Theatre Writer & Dramaturg
purpose: Review and polish Japanese translations for stagecraft accuracy.

title: JP↔EN Literary Translator
purpose: Translate English↔Japanese with publication-grade quality.

title: Poetic English (Stage)
purpose: Create sweeping, theatrical, poetic English renderings.
definition_of_done: ["Poetic EN track delivered", "Notes attached", "Approved by dramaturg"]

title: Poetic English (Stage)
purpose: Write singable or lyrical English adaptations as needed.

title: Autonomic Nervous System Specialist (MD)
purpose: Map symptoms to autonomic syndromes and outline clinician pathways (educational).

title: Medical Investigator & Evidence Synthesist
purpose: Build case timelines and evidence maps; prepare briefs for clinicians.
